name: FamCare hackthon
description:
A comprehensive family care coordination and support platform powered by Gemini AI, featuring dashboarding, smart scheduling, health tracking, and an intelligent family assistant.
To optimize the FamCare intelligence layer, I have designed a distributed prompting architecture. This approach separates "Reasoning" (complex medical triage) from "Retrieval" (hospital grounding) and "Empathy" (voice interaction).
The AI Distribution Strategy:
The Clinical Triage (Gemini 3 Pro): Uses a "Safety-First" reasoning chain. It is instructed to look for specific "Danger Signs" of pregnancy complications common in maternal health (Preeclampsia, Preterm labor).
The Grounding Hub (Gemini 2.5 Flash): Specifically tuned for the Google Maps tool. It acts as a bridge between the patient's GPS coordinates and the Rwandan Ministry of Health facility network.
The Empathy Engine (Gemini 2.5 Flash Native Audio): Designed for the Live API to provide low-latency, soothing vocal support during high-stress medical moments.
The Journal Analyst (Gemini 3 Flash): Performs sentiment analysis and extracts milestones from raw text to populate the family dashboard.
